changelog.change: Development focus has switched to a browser extension. The extension can also highlight segments. Get it here: https://github.com/Dalet/run-highlighter/releases/latest
Added a button to open the highlight page in the default browser. If you have the extension installed you can click that instead of "Open Highlighter".
Rewritten the highlighter injection to be more reliable.
Run History is now pulled from the splits. Keeping Run Highlighter in the layout during runs is no longer required. Run History from previous Run Highlighter versions isn't usable.
Added a setting to hide runs recorded without internet clock sync.
Fixed the category not being saved in the run history.
Fixed [RT!=GT] block not behaving as expected when Real Time and Game Time are identical.
Fixed "Open Highlighter" button staying greyed out when initializing Internet Explorer failed.
Solved a huge memory leak by using Internet Explorer.
Fixed Auto-create only fully working with English Twitch.
Added customization for the pre-filled fields. (double click on Run Highlighter in the layout editor)
Added a warning when a time range is potentially incorrect.
